description:
Casshern and Braiking Boss have a score to settle in the sauna. Jetto needs clothing advice. Anchorman Masu gets help with his articulation. The thirty-eight-year-old Jennys groupie is looking for a husband.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Casshern Kenkou Land de Saikai / Boyacky no Heya (Guest: Cobalt Nii-san) / ZIP! x PLTV Boyacky no Heya (Guest: Masu Announcer) / Kekkonsoudan Tokoro Genjitsu Mietenai OL Hen
Casshern`s Reunion at the Health Center / Boyacky`s Room / Zip! Peeping Life TV: Boyacky`s Room / Matchmaking Center: Working Woman in Denial
